short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will display and refresh your SalesForce dashboards in a fullscreen scrolling window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CHANGELOG

Version 1.5
- Add Lightning Experience support

Version 1.4.5
- Allow the plugin to run on cloudforce.com

Version 1.4.4
- Fixed bug in refresh and scrolling logic

Version 1.4
- Removed jQuery dependency
- Fixed bug in package

Version 1.1
- It's now possible to configure how often the data is automatically refreshed.
- You can now configure the scrolling speed.

Version 1.0
- Initial release
